channel.title: Covid-19: Epidemic Reports
channel.description: Recent content on Covid-19: Epidemic Reports

item.title: 2020-02-25: Epidemic Map for cities (Covid-19)
item.description: Updated: 2020-02-25 13:26:44 (UTC+08:00) Confirmed cases. The gray area in the figure indicates the lack of relevant data of the cities in this area. Click here for full screen display. 2020-02-25 Epidemic Data Sheet ( Cities ) Rank Area Area_cn Confirmed Cured Dead 1 Wuhan 武汉 47071 10337 2043 2 Xiaogan 孝感 3482 1328 110 3 Huanggang 黄冈 2904 1760 106 4 Jingzhou 荆州 1576 776 42

item.title: 2020-02-25: Epidemic Mitigation Time Forecast (Covid-19)
item.description: Time trends and model predictions of confirmed cases across the country Due to the adding of clinical diagnosis to confirm cases, since February 13, our model will use the “confirmed + suspected” cases instead of the original “confirmed” cases as our variables. Data from February 09, 10 and 11 were removed from the model because cases were underreported and then included all at once on February 12. National Epidemic Time Series

item.title: 2020-02-12: Epidemic Mitigation Time Forecast (Covid-19)
item.description: Time trends and model predictions of confirmed cases across the country Our model shows that the national epidemic situation will ease on 02-24 (the number of confirmed cases will not increase significantly). On 2020-02-14 there will be 931 new confirmed cases and in total 45781 confirmed cases. National Epidemic Time Series Date Total Conf. Crnt Conf. Crnt Susp. Crnt Sevr. Total Death. Total Cured Total Conf.+Susp.

item.title: About
item.description: This is the website for information of 2019-nCoV outbreak. WeChat official account Project Homepage If you have any suggestions for this project, please feel free to submit an issue to the project homepage: https://github.com/pzhaonet/ncov The Laiyindata Team Dr. ZHAO Peng: database construction, website building and maintainence, data visualization Dr. ZOU Yi: prediction model development Dr. WANG Xiaoxiang: Brand and activity planning, copywriting Dr. HAN Lei: International interface Contact <openr(at)pzhao.

item.title: Covid-19 Epidemic Data Download
item.description: We collect several ways to get the 2019-nCoV epidemic data. Use the R ncovr package R users can get the epidemic data via the ncovr package we develop, which basically includes the datasets described later. # Install the remotes package install.packages('remotes') # Install the ncovr package remotes::install_github('pzhaonet/ncovr') # windows users have to set the Chinese environment Sys.setlocale('LC_CTYPE', 'Chinese') # Load the ncovr package require("ncovr") # read RDS data (default；recommended) get_ncov() # read .

item.title: Overview of Covid-19
item.description: Introduction of the virus Disease: New Coronavirus Covid-19 Source of infection: patients who are already with new coronavirus infection. Asymptomatic patients can also be contagious. Ways of Transmission: Respiratory droplets and contact transmission are the main ways of transmission. Other transmission ways such as aerosol and digestive tract are yet to be confirmed. Vulnerable population: Generally susceptible to all population. Elderly people and those with chronic diseases are more sick after infection.
